name: File Stream Bot
description: A Pyrogram Telegram bot to access Telegram Files via the web.

ENV.description: Set this to True if you don't want to crash the bot

INDEX_DOMAIN.description: The BIN Channel ID. Read the readme for more info about this var

DRIVE_URI.description: Floodwait Sleep timer. Read the readme for more info about this var

MONGO_URI.description: Number of workers that is to be assigned. Read the readme for more info about this var

API_ID.description: If you don't want your port to be displayed. Read the readme for more info about this var

API_HASH.description: Read the readme for more info about this var

BOT_TOKEN.description: The time in s you want the servers to be pinged each time to avoid sleeping.

OWNER_ID.description: A Fully Qualified Domain Name or Heroku App URL. (eg. https://example.herokuapp.com). Update it After Deploying the Bot
Your Telegram User ID(Note: Not Username)

DUMP_CHANNEL.description: Update Channel Username without @ eg: AWeirdText

DUMP_CHANNEL_LINK.description: Set to True, if you want every user Join update channel to use the bot

USER_ID.description: Mongodb Database Name Default to F2LxBot

USER_HASH.description: If you want to make the server ping itself every `PING_INTERVAL` seconds to avoid sleeping. Helpful in PaaS Free tiers. Defaults to `False`
